Package io.github.xnovo3000.eventus.api.util

Interface DtoMapper

public interface DtoMapper
Map functions generated by MapStruct to map Entity to DTO beans

  • Method Details

    • toEventDto

      @NotNull @NotNull EventDto toEventDto(@NotNull @NotNull Event event, String username)
      Create an EventDto starting from an Event. This method evaluates also the username to check if 'canSubscribe', 'canUnsubscribe' and 'canRate' must be true or false
      Parameters:
      event - The Event
      username - The user's username
      Returns:
      The EventDto

    • toEventCardDto

      @NotNull @NotNull EventCardDto toEventCardDto(@NotNull @NotNull Event event)
      Create an EventDto starting from an Event. The fields 'canSubscribe', 'canUnsubscribe' and 'canRate' are set to false
      Parameters:
      event - The Event
      Returns:
      The EventCardDto

    • toEventCardDto

      @NotNull @NotNull EventCardDto toEventCardDto(@NotNull @NotNull Event event, String username)
      Create an EventCardDto starting from an Event. This method evaluates also the username to check if 'canSubscribe', 'canUnsubscribe' and 'canRate' must be true or false
      Parameters:
      event - The Event
      username - The user's username
      Returns:
      The EventCardDto

      Parameters:
